description: The Norman Gunston show volume one features highlights from the television series "The Norman Gunston show", aired in 1993. Comedian Garry McDonald appears in character as Norman Gunston, a guileless interviewer and performer with a variety/entertainment show. Interviewees on this disc include: Sylvania Waters, Billy Crystal, Jackie Collins, Anthony Lapaglia and Corbin Bernsen. Includes a musical number from Australian pop band, Girlfriend, and Gunston's comedic renditions of the hit songs, "Simply irresistible" and "I Will always love you", the Dolly Parton/Whitney Houston ballad. One segment features Gunston at a rave, interviewing teenage patrons, discussing with them the dangers of drugs.
